name: The Perfectionist's Guidebook Notion Template
description: Unveil the Perfectionist's Ultimate Guidebook — a Free Notion Template!I get it. You're the type who won't settle for anything less than perfect. Whether it's your career, relationships, or personal growth, you aim for nothing short of excellence. But that drive can sometimes create its own set of hurdles—like paralysis by analysis, fear of failure, and the inevitable burnout.Know that you can harness your perfectionism to become your very own superpower! Allow me to introduce the Perfectionist'
features: Deep dive into the reasons behind your perfectionism; Tackle the challenges that come with being a perfectionist; Transform your perfectionism into a strength; Daring Greatlyby Brené Brown; The Gift of Imperfectionby Brené Brown; Mindsetby Carol S. Dweck; The Subtle Art of Not Giving a Fck* by Mark Manson; Perfectionism
